original_title: T-ARA Japan Tour 2012 ~Jewelry Box~ Live in Budokan
overview: In 2012, Korean female group T-ara wrapped up their first Japanese concert tour in the sacred Nippon Budokan. Now, see the glamorous concert in its entirety with the Jewelry Box – LIVE IN BUDOKAN home video release!  This edition includes a special hour-long interview with T-ara and a 28-page photobook.
title: T-ARA Japan Tour 2012 ~Jewelry Box~ Live in Budokan
